languages.text: "Два пса по цене одного. Выгодная сделка! Правда, оба нуждаются в дрессировке, но мы с этим поработаем, верно?"
"Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"
languages.original_text: "Два пса по цене одного. Выгодная сделка! Правда, оба нуждаются в дрессировке, но мы с этим поработаем, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Two dogs for the price of one is a steal! Both still need to be properly trained, but it's nothing we can't work through, right?"
"Two dogs for the price of one is a steal! Both still need to be properly trained, but it's nothing we can't work through, right?"
"Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"
"Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"
"Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"
"Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"

languages.text: «Dos perros por el precio de uno, ¡menuda oferta! Aún hay que entrenarlos en condiciones, claro, pero todo se andará, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"

traits.locale_text: «Dos perros por el precio de uno, ¡menuda oferta! Aún hay que entrenarlos en condiciones, claro, pero todo se andará, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: “两条狗，买一送一，真是笔划算的买卖！当然，这两条狗都需要适当训练，但我们肯定能把狗训好，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"

traits.locale_text: “两条狗，买一送一，真是笔划算的买卖！当然，这两条狗都需要适当训练，但我们肯定能把狗训好，是吧？”

languages.text: « Deux chiens de garde pour le prix d'un. À croire que c'est mon jour de chance ! Bien sûr, il va falloir les dresser, mais ça ne devrait pas poser de problème, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"

traits.locale_text: « Deux chiens de garde pour le prix d'un. À croire que c'est mon jour de chance ! Bien sûr, il va falloir les dresser, mais ça ne devrait pas poser de problème, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: 「一匹の値段で二匹の犬。お得だな！もちろん、両方ともまだ適切な訓練が必要だが、なんとかなるだろ？」
languages.original_text: "Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"

traits.locale_text: 「一匹の値段で二匹の犬。お得だな！もちろん、両方ともまだ適切な訓練が必要だが、なんとかなるだろ？」

languages.text: "Bir fiyatına iki itim oldu. Ne şanslıyım! Elbette ikisinin de düzgün bir eğitimden geçmesi gerekiyor ama o da olacak, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir fiyatına iki itim oldu. Ne şanslıyım! Elbette ikisinin de düzgün bir eğitimden geçmesi gerekiyor ama o da olacak, değil mi?"

languages.text: "Zwei Hunde zum Preis von einem. Ein echtes Schnäppchen! Natürlich müssen beide erst noch abgerichtet werden, aber das kriegen wir hin, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Two dogs for the price of one. What a steal! Of course, both still need to be properly trained, but we'll get there, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Zwei Hunde zum Preis von einem. Ein echtes Schnäppchen! Natürlich müssen beide erst noch abgerichtet werden, aber das kriegen wir hin, oder?"
